Literature Review: The integration of local projections and vector autoregressions (VARs) has the potential to revolutionize the way we analyze the dynamic causal effect of interventions on outcomes in applied macro- and microeconomics. This review aims to bridge the gap between these two literatures and explore the potential of local projections to translate the familiar language of VARs into the language of potential outcomes and treatment effects.
